snippet.title: START AGAIN: a prologue - TRAILER
snippet.description:
START AGAIN START AGAIN START AGAIN: A PROLOGUE (or: START AGAIN: a prologue) is a story driven RPG where you, Siffrin, are stuck in a time loop for no reason you can find.

You're fine though! Hiding your knowledge from your friends is easy! Fighting the same enemies is easy! Dying to the same final boss over and over again is easy!

You have to make sure your friends don't find out about the super fun times you're having though.

They can't know.


They can't.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

get the game on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1691420/START_AGAIN_a_prologue/
get the game on itch.io: https://insertdisc5.itch.io/start-again-prologue


game by adrienne bazir / insertdisc5 - https://www.insertdisc5.com/
music by studio thumpy puppy - https://twitter.com/thumpypuppy
trailer by sam inverts - http://inversionstudios.net/
